1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Input resources.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Input
6  ( -- * Input
7    Input (..),
8    inputText,
9    readInput,
10    readInputs,
11    readJudge,
12  ) where
13
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base  as B
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data  as D
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core  as C
17
18-- | Input resource.
19data Input = Stdin | File FilePath
20             deriving (Show, Eq)
21
22-- | Input name.
23inputText :: Input -> String
24inputText (Stdin)   = "<stdin>"
25inputText (File p)  = p
26
27-- | Read input resource.
28readInput :: Input -> IO String
29readInput (Stdin)   = getContents
30readInput (File p)  = readFile p
31
32-- | Read multiple input resources.
33readInputs :: [Input] -> IO [String]
34readInputs = mapM readInput
35
36-- | Read input code and extract judges.
37readJudge :: String -> [D.JudgeC]
38readJudge code =
39    case C.resReadBytes B.def $ B.stringBz code of
40      Right res  -> C.resJudge res
41      Left _     -> []
42
